title: Revenue by Customer
sql: SELECT c.company_name, SUM(i.amount) as total_revenue FROM read_parquet('.evidence/template/static/data/snowflake_saas/invoices/*.parquet') i JOIN read_parquet('.evidence/template/static/data/snowflake_saas/customers/*.parquet') c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10
